bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I often build anthills. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and can lift heavy things.
👑 I live in a colony with a queen.
🧺 I carry crumbs to my home.

bug.question: I float on the wind with colorful wings. I drink nectar from flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I start as a caterpillar.
🦋 I am beautiful and fly around gardens.
🌸 I like sweet juice from flowers.

bug.question: I am a red bug with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My shell is red and round.
⚫ I have black dots on my back.
🍀 Finding me is a sign of good things.

bug.question: I make honey. I live in a hive. I can sting you if I feel threatened. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make a sweet, sticky treat.
🏠 I live with lots of other workers.
🐝 I buzz around and collect pollen.

bug.question: I hop around and chirp in the grass. I have long legs and eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am green and jump very high.
🎶 I make a sound in the summer.
🌾 I like to eat grass and leaves.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. I use light to attract a mate. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have a light on my bottom.
✨ I only glow when it is dark.
🔥 I use my light to find another like me.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I make a trap to catch dinner.
🕷️ I have more legs than most bugs.
🏠 I live in the corner of your room (sometimes!).

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound and like to bite. I drink blood. I am very annoying. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I leave itchy bumps on your skin.
📢 My sound is like a tiny airplane.
🧛 I only want a little bit of your blood.

bug.question: I eat wood and live in tunnels. I can cause damage to houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I enjoy eating trees and wood.
🏠 I can make holes in the structure of your home.
🐜 I look a bit like an ant, but I am different.

bug.question: I eat plants and can be many colors. I can sometimes ruin a farmer's crops. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I eat plants and leave holes in the leaves.
🪴 Some people think I'm pretty, but others don't like me.
🐛 I turn into something with wings!

ocean.question: I wave but have no hands. I have sand but am not a playground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm very big!
🏖️ You can build sandcastles next to me.
🚢 Boats sail on me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I am big and gray and swim in the ocean. I breathe through a hole on the top of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🎶 I sing songs under the sea.
🌊 I am bigger than a dolphin.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can change color to hide. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am a sea creature.
🎨 I can blend in with my surroundings.
💪 I have more arms than you!

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. I have stripes and a silly name. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in warm waters.
🤡 My name sounds funny.
⚕️ People know me from a movie where I helped find someone.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and swim very fast in the ocean. I am a type of fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
👃 My nose looks like a weapon.
🌊 I’m named after something soldiers carry.

ocean.question: I am a very small sea creature that many animals eat, and I travel in huge groups. What am I?

hints.text: 🦐 I am a crustacean.
🌎 Many whales eat me!
🧊 I live in cold waters.

ocean.question: I am a very long, thin fish that hides in the rocks. I look like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no scales.
🪨 I hide in crevices.
🔦 Some types of me can give off light.

ocean.question: I am a structure underwater, built by tiny animals. Many fish live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of rock, but alive!
🌴 I'm like a rainforest of the sea.
☀️ I need sunlight to survive.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. It is very cold and dark there. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 No sunlight reaches me.
🌊 I'm a very deep ditch.
📍 I’m named after a ship
